row.process:
:DEFINE &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_NAMES#, string, 5 :DEFINE &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_VALUES#, string, 5
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_NAMES#[1] = "name" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_NAMES#[2] = "description" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_NAMES#[3] = "creation-time" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_NAMES#[4] = "detected-by" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_NAMES#[5] = "severity"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_VALUES#[1] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_SUMMARY#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_VALUES#[2] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_DESCRIPTION#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_VALUES#[3] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_DETECTED_DATE#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_VALUES#[4] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_DETECTED_BY#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_VALUES#[5] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_SEVERITY#"
:PUBLISH &UC4RB_HPQC_DOMAIN_NAME# :PUBLISH &UC4RB_HPQC_PROJECT_NAME#
:DELETE_VAR PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.TEMPLATE.VARA.PROJECT_LIST , &UC4RB_HPQC_LIST_KEY_NAME# :DELETE_VAR PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.TEMPLATE.VARA.PROJECT_USERS_LIST , &UC4RB_HPQC_USERS_KEY_NAME#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.HPQC_ARRAYS_TO_DEFECT_XML
